name: cig
description: cig ($cig) represents the global smoking culture in form of a token launched on the Solana blockchain. With $cig, holders become a part of a global movement that consists of more than 1 billion smokers. Smoking has long been intertwined with sovereignty and the timeless appeal of iconic figures. By participating in $cigi, both smokers and ex-smokers can embrace a longlived tradition through the Solana ecosystem.
